select.if: SELECT '진행' APRV_ST, APRV_NO, EMP_NO, TTL, DTTM, REQ_ST, DEADLINE, IMPTS, NM FROM APRV WHERE APRV_NO IN (SELECT APRV_NO FROM APPROVAL WHERE APRVR = #{aprvr} AND APRV_ST = '진행') UNION SELECT '위임' APRV_ST, APRV_NO, EMP_NO, TTL, DTTM, REQ_ST, DEADLINE, IMPTS, NM FROM APRV WHERE APRV_NO IN (SELECT APRV_NO FROM APPROVAL WHERE APRVR IN (SELECT EMP_NO FROM TRUST WHERE RPTT = #{aprvr} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN SDT AND EDT) AND APRV_ST = '진행')
SELECT '참조' APRV_ST, APRV_NO, EMP_NO, TTL, DTTM, REQ_ST, DEADLINE, IMPTS, NM FROM APRV WHERE APRV_NO IN (SELECT APRV_NO FROM REFER WHERE EMP_NO = #{aprvr}) ORDER BY APRV_NO DESC

SELECT '반려' APRV_ST, APRV_NO, EMP_NO, TTL, DTTM, REQ_ST, DEADLINE, IMPTS, NM FROM APRV WHERE APRV_NO IN (SELECT APRV_NO FROM APPROVAL WHERE APRVR = #{aprvr} AND APRV_ST = '반려') UNION SELECT '위임' APRV_ST, APRV_NO, EMP_NO, TTL, DTTM, REQ_ST, DEADLINE, IMPTS, NM FROM APRV WHERE APRV_NO IN (SELECT APRV_NO FROM APPROVAL WHERE APRVR IN (SELECT EMP_NO FROM TRUST WHERE RPTT = #{aprvr} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN SDT AND EDT) AND APRV_ST = '반려') UNION SELECT '완료' APRV_ST, APRV_NO, EMP_NO, TTL, DTTM, REQ_ST, DEADLINE, IMPTS, NM FROM APRV WHERE APRV_NO IN (SELECT APRV_NO FROM APPROVAL WHERE APRVR = #{aprvr} AND APRV_ST = '완료') UNION SELECT '위임' APRV_ST, APRV_NO, EMP_NO, TTL, DTTM, REQ_ST, DEADLINE, IMPTS, NM FROM APRV WHERE APRV_NO IN (SELECT APRV_NO FROM APPROVAL WHERE APRVR IN (SELECT EMP_NO FROM TRUST WHERE RPTT = #{aprvr} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN SDT AND EDT) AND APRV_ST = '완료') ORDER BY APRV_NO DESC

mapper.update: UPDATE APPROVAL SET APRV_DTTM = SYSDATE, APRV_ST = '완료' WHERE APRV_NO = #{aprvNo} AND APRV_ST = '진행'
UPDATE APPROVAL SET APRV_DTTM = SYSDATE, APRV_ST = '반려', REJECT = #{reject} WHERE APRV_NO = #{aprvNo} AND APRV_ST = '진행'
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(TRUST_NO),0)+1 FROM TRUST
INSERT INTO TRUST (TRUST_NO, EMP_NO, RPTT, SDT, EDT, NM, RPTT_NM) VALUES (#{trustNo}, #{empNo}, #{rptt}, #{sdt}, #{edt}, #{nm}, #{rpttNm})
mapper.select: SELECT SIGN, NM, POSITION FROM EMP WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}
